column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Asami says : " How 's it looking in there ? "
#Text=Korra says : " I just airbent all the sand out of the engine room .
#Text=" Korra says : " How 's it going out here ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Well , she 's still pretty banged up , but I think she might be able to limp out of the desert .
#Text=Kong , you want to see if you can get the engine started ?
#Text=" Kong says : " Aye aye !
#Text=" Arik says : " All right !
#Text=" Korra says : " That 's no spirit !
#Text=I think it 's gone now .
#Text=" Arik says : " Kong , are you all right ?
#Text=What are we going to do ?
#Text=All of our supplies were on the ship .
#Text=We 've got no food , no water .
#Text=" Captain says : " Easy , Arik .
#Text=Another ship is on the way .
#Text=We just need to hold our position for a few hours .
#Text=" Asami says : " We might not have a few hours .
#Text=" Korra says : " How far are we from the edge of the desert ?
#Text=" Captain says : " Too far to walk , if that 's what you 're thinking .
#Text=" Arik says : " We ca n't just wait around to for that thing to pick us off one by one !
#Text=" Captain says : " You 'll do as you 're told , Airman .
#Text=Now get a hold of yourself !
#Text=" Asami says : " Maybe we can still build something to get us all out of here .
#Text=" Captain says : " You want to make some wings out of scrap metal and flap real hard ?
#Text=" Asami says : " No , but we might have enough material to construct a makeshift sand - sailer .
#Text=Like the sandbenders use to get around .
#Text=All we need is a sail and some kind of sled to attach it to .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's worth a try .
#Text=" Captain says : " Gather every piece of metal you can find .
#Text=We 'll give that sandy beast a run for his money yet .
#Text="
